name: 薛文景
objective:
本課程主要介紹有關材料反應動力學的電化基礎理論與技術。
This course is to device a theory that can quantitatively rationalize the observed behavior of electrode kinetics with respect to potential and concentration. The theroy serves as an aid for understanding kinetics efect in new situation with a brief review of certain aspect of homogeneous kinetics to provide both a familiar starting ground and basis for the contruction of the electrochemical kinetic theory.
schedule:
週次/單元主題
1. Dynamic equlibrium
2. The Arrhenius equation and potential energy surfaces
3. Activated complex theory
4. Essentials of electrode reactions
5. Kinetic model based on electrochmical potentials 
6. Implication of the current-potential characteristic-
7. Equilibrium condition/ Exchange current-
8. The current overpotential equation
9. Miderm tests( Report)
10  Approximate forms of the i-v equation
11. exchange current plot
12. Very Facile kinetics Reversible behavior
13. Effects of mass transfer
14. Mutistep mechanisms
15. Microcopic theory of charge -transfer kinetics
16. Final test
